title: Didnt mean to buy Pulse Fire Ezreal
body:
I went to view the Pulse Fire skin For Ezreal and when I did it actually bought it, 
I don't know if it was the location of my mouse or what, but it bought it. 
When I first made my account I did not know there was a limit on refunds (this was around 2012) and I used them all. 
My question is could I get a refund or not?

replies.body: You can totally refund a purchase that was an accident or mistake, with some limitations.  As long as you have one of your 3 allotted refund tokens and within 90 days then you can manually refund your content through the store.  More details are also available in our [refund guidelines](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).  If you have no tokens left, there might not be anything we can do.  I can't make any guarantees, but you can hit us up in a ticket and we can look for possibilities.  Hope that helps!
